notFilledOut: Please fill in all blanks to view solution
a11yCheck: Check the answers. The responses will be marked as correct, incorrect, or unanswered.
a11yShowSolution: Show the solution. The task will be marked with its correct solution.
a11yRetry: Retry the task. Reset all responses and start the task over again.

confirmCheck.body: Are you sure you wish to finish ?

confirmRetry.body: Are you sure you wish to retry ?

questions: Automatic Evaluation Metrics (AEMs) are meaningful and correct if they correlate with *human judgment/human evaluation:Another way of assessing the quality of an MT output* and real-world experience of how *acceptable/usable: adjective used to qualify user satisfaction* an MT output is (e.g. as evidenced by a translator's or user's post-editing effort, or time spent fixing the mistakes).
